H3.text: where is the world 's largest thermometer located. Baker , California

A4.text: The town's most prominent feature is a 134-foot (41 m) thermometer... in Baker, California.

A5.text: Its height commemorates the hottest temperature ever recorded on Earth, 134 °F (56.7 °C), in nearby Death Valley on July 10, 1913.
